products.title: Spectrum, Light Pearl - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, light pearl - venetian blind the pretty elegance of the spectrum light pearl will simply blow you away with its contemporary, quality design, pale cream hue, and durable aluminium slats. There is no colour-clashing to be found either, will coord
products.productdescription: The pretty elegance of the spectrum light pearl will simply blow you away with its contemporary, quality design, pale cream hue, and durable aluminium slats. There is no colour-clashing to be found either, will coordinating cords and rails that blend perfectly with the rest of the blind. Harmonise with a creamy white colour scheme in the bathroom or kitchen, where the wipe-clean slats will come in extra handy. Accentuate with sky blues or mid-greens for a cool and calming feel, or with navy blue or plum purple for sophisticated warmth.

products.title: Spectrum, Almond - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, almond - venetian blind the creamy nuttiness of the spectrum in almond provides a beautiful neutral blind with a soft, satin finish. Quality aluminium slats and a sturdy pull-cord make this a practical choice for a family home where it will get
products.productdescription: The creamy nuttiness of the spectrum in almond provides a beautiful neutral blind with a soft, satin finish. Quality aluminium slats and a sturdy pull-cord make this a practical choice for a family home where it will get plenty of use.Tame brightly patterned wallpapers in the kids' bedroom or playroom, where durability and sturdiness are a must. Or for a sophisticated look in the living room, team with a deep burgundy to promote a cosy and homely feel that you won't want to be away from.

products.title: Spectrum, Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Spectrum, dove grey - venetian blind the satin-finish dove grey from the spectrum range features a barely-there white-grey on hardwearing aluminium slats, that can be easily adjusted using the colour-matching pull-cords on the side of the blind. <br/
products.productdescription: The satin-finish dove grey from the spectrum range features a barely-there white-grey on hardwearing aluminium slats, that can be easily adjusted using the colour-matching pull-cords on the side of the blind. Use the dove grey as part of a white colour scheme in the bathroom, for something just a little darker, or use as a neutral to temper bold reds, rich plums, or dark greys in the living room or dining room. Whichever you go for, you'll love the subtle beauty of this venetian blind.
